2062.subject: ED
2062.descrlong: Practical applications of teaching theory, methodology, and pedagogy of learning. Co-taught by university professors, local classroom teachers, and specialists in the field of K-12 teaching. Content covers classroom management, lesson plans, education law, and instructional strategies in curriculum content areas with a special emphasis on SDAIE and ELA techniques for teaching a diverse population. (Offered as interest warrants.)
